-- Hoogle documentation, generated by Haddock
-- See Hoogle, http://www.haskell.org/hoogle/


-- | Higher kinded type removal
--   
--   A type that can be used to cut out a type. This can be useful in
--   records, for instance.
@package hole
@version 0.1.1

module Data.Hole.Lazy
data Hole a
Hole :: Hole a
instance Read (Hole a)
instance Monad Hole
instance Functor Hole
instance Ord (Hole a)
instance Eq (Hole a)
instance Show (Hole a)

module Data.Hole.Strict
data Hole a
Hole :: Hole a
instance Show (Hole a)
instance Read (Hole a)
instance Eq (Hole a)
instance Ord (Hole a)
instance Monad Hole
instance Functor Hole

module Data.Hole
